Name: La Maria
Review Text: Really good Italian pizza in the neighborhood, cozy environment and friendly staff. They also show care and passion when choosing the ingredients, coming from local farms. We'll be back for sure!

Name: La Maria
Review Text: The bread appetizer and the pizza's were very disappointing, the dough in both was very undercooked. It felt as if the dough contained too much flower and/or wasn't given enough time to rise. Service was ok.

Name: La Maria
Review Text: Romantic wood hoven pizza place. The pizza is legendary and uses very good ingredients. The atmosphere and the people are great. Definitely one of our hotspots in Amsterdam Zuid.

Name: La Maria
Review Text: Cute little local Italian authentic restaurant. In my lovely neighbourhood but there's no menu to show you which I love but I couldn't hear the explanation of the dishes and well when you're in a group don't be too loud, no one likes a noisy crowd. But beautiful. Will be back. The fresh bread to start. Ummmm amazing

Name: La Maria
Review Text: Lovely small restaurant full of charm. Decent wines on the menu and great pizzas.

Name: La Maria
Review Text: Really nice with good food and enthusiastic owners, a real gem away from the busy street.

Name: La Maria
Review Text: Amazing. Great food. Lovely staff. Had some wonderful wine and a main course I'd like to eat another five times! Service was really good and, even though they'd only just opened and they had a big group in they gave us great service.

Name: La Maria
Review Text: Living in the neighborhood, we passed by this cozy restaurant so many times and yesterday was the evening we finally decided to taste their food. From the moment we entered the restaurant, we had the feeling that we accidentally entered â€¦

Name: La Maria
Review Text: Very cozy place, when we were there it was run by two ladies of which one was the chef and the other took the orders. â€¦

Name: La Maria
Review Text: Great ambiance. Pizza was delicious. Moreover, the wine was really good. It was a certified organic merlot. Thank you. Will be back soon.

Name: La Maria
Review Text: La Maria is truly delicious - but you need to go in knowning that this is a different sort of dining experience to a mainstream restaurant. There are no printed menus, not even a chalkboard, so be ready to trust the chef and listen as you â€¦

Name: La Maria
Review Text: Warm atmosphere with friendly attendence (even though they were rather busy).

Name: La Maria

Name: La Maria
Review Text: Just perfect. Cozy, good food, feels like home.

Name: La Maria

Name: La Maria
Review Text: This place is amazing, the food and the wine are delicious. Because everything comes from the oven, the wait can be a bit long. But that doesn't matter anymore when you have taste the food.

Name: La Maria
Review Text: The best meal we have had in our 3 yrs in the Netherlands! Absolutely inspiring and delicious! We will be back ðŸ˜ƒ

Name: La Maria
Review Text: Just wonderful! Like eating at Pippi Longstockings please.... Basic but wonderfully prepared food. All prepared in a clay oven. And I just have a soft spot for Rohan!

Name: La Maria
Review Text: such a sweet place to have a lovely dinner. atmosphere is cozy and relaxed, the food is amazingly delicious and the owners are such lovely people. <3

Name: La Maria
